title: DRAFT Robot configuration
description: DRAFT Describes the robot configuration. This does not change for the whole robot application.

$schema.description: allow $schema in a datafile such that we have editor support and self-description of the content

description.description: Description of the robot configuration, i.e. where it is located in the lab, special considerations, etc.

real_world_time.description: true if executed in real-world time.  If false, computations are done as fast as possible without regards to the specified sample time.  If false, the simulation property should be true.
